title: Navigating and Resolving Relationship Problems
description: This journey is designed to help you and your partner navigate and resolve conflicts effectively. Each day, you'll engage with exercises, questions, and activities that build your communication skills and problem-solving abilities. By the end of this journey, you'll feel more equipped to address challenges together and find solutions as a team.

subtopics.title: Understanding Conflict Styles
subtopics.description: Discover your individual conflict styles and how they affect your relationship. Use questions and reflection to understand how you typically respond during disagreements.

content.title: How do you handle disagreements or conflicts?
How do you handle disagreements, and what's your favorite way for us to make up after a fight?

subtopics.title: Communication Basics
subtopics.description: Focus on enhancing your communication skills during conflicts. Explore effective listening techniques and the importance of clear expression through exercises and games.

content.title: How do you prefer to communicate your needs and desires?
What's your favorite memory of us having a great conversation?

subtopics.title: Constructive Conflict Resolution
subtopics.description: Learn how to turn disagreements into constructive conversations. Engage with exercises and articles that provide strategies for resolving conflicts without escalating them.

content.title: How can we make our disagreements more constructive?
Can you recall a time when you felt misunderstood? How did you handle it?

subtopics.title: Money Matters and Conflict
subtopics.description: Explore how financial discussions can lead to conflict and how to navigate these conversations. Work on budgeting styles and financial communication through tests and discussions.

content.title: How do you feel about our different spending habits, and how can we find a middle ground?
Do you have any issues with budgeting? Like, are you in debt to somebody? Do you make any useless spending?

subtopics.title: Creating a Safe Space for Discussions
subtopics.description: Build an environment where both partners feel safe to express their feelings. Use checkups and exercises to facilitate open dialogues and address underlying issues.

content.title: Are there any habits or behaviors of mine that bother you?
Describe a time when a simple text message led to a big misunderstanding. How did you resolve it?

subtopics.title: Turning Conflict into Growth
subtopics.description: Shift your perspective on conflict by learning how to use it as a tool for growth. Reflect on past conflicts, apply humor, and create personal growth plans as a couple.

content.title: What's a past problem we've solved that makes you proud of us?
What's a relationship problem you think we can solve with humor?
